dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Who chose to bring me here? Think you can handle the consequences?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Dawn isn’t the time for me. I wonder why people decide to waste their energy by getting up early?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Wow~ What a lovely day for mutilation~ Isn’t that right, Dante? …Aha, I was kidding, of course.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I heard Rodya is a rather skilled gambler, is that right? Perhaps I’ll ask her for a match or two?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Dante, how about changing out of that drab outfit into something more unique that better suits a manager? I could lend you some clothing if you want.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Now then… You’re not upset with me or anything, right, Dante? I can’t see your expressions, so it’s kinda been nagging me~

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: How do you hold a knife? It’s simple. Just grab it as you like and swing it up, down, and around on your whims.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: You see, luck… is something you earn. Life doesn’t serve you up a jackpot if you just sit and wait~

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: I’ll introduce you to my buddies later~ They can be rough talkers, but they’re all nice when you get to know them~

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Gee, it looks like someone doesn’t value their own life, huh?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Oh, you’re flattering me~ I won’t say no to it, though~

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Is it my turn?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Let’s get some warm-up~

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Do you need my help, Dante?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I hope luck is on my side~

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Well, Dante? Did you see?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Unk!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Just too easy~

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: Maybe I should’ve lent a bit of my luck?

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Luck goes hand in hand with skill.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Hmm… Fortune isn’t on my side.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Well now, this was basically child’s play~

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Oh my, we’re done with them already~ I can go now, can’t I?

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: This… can’t be~?
